/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC    -g -Wl,--fatal-warnings -Wl,--no-undefined -lc    -shared -Wl,-soname,libvtkCommonSystem-6.2.so.1 -o /home/snr/Support/Plus-build-codeblocks/bin/libvtkCommonSystem-6.2.so.1 CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkClientSocket.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkDirectory.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkServerSocket.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkSocket.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkSocketCollection.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkThreadMessager.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkTimerLog.cxx.o /home/snr/Support/Plus-build-codeblocks/bin/libvtkCommonCore-6.2.so.1 /home/snr/Support/Plus-build-codeblocks/bin/libvtksys-6.2.so.1 -lpthread -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/snr/Support/Plus-build-codeblocks/bin:
